DVSFIFONotStartedException Class Reference

Attempt to use a FIFO video input or output function without first starting the FIFO. More...

#include <DVSClasses.h>

Inheritance diagram for DVSFIFONotStartedException::


Public Methods

 DVSFIFONotStartedException (const char *context, std::exception *e) throw ()
 DVSFIFONotStartedException (const DVSFIFONotStartedException &e) throw ()

Detailed Description

Attempt to use a FIFO video input or output function without first starting the FIFO.

DVSCard::FIFO_StartDMAInput or DVSCard::FIFO_StopDMAOutput must be called prior to using FIFO video input or output functions respectively.

Parameters:
context   Information on the context in which this exception is occurring - eg. the function call that caused it. NULL if no context string is required
e   The causal parent exception of this one being instantiated. See DVSException::DVSException()
See also:
DVSCard::FIFO_StartDMAInput , DVSCard::FIFO_StartDMAOutput
